instructions.title: How to get your API Key
instructions.step2: Sign in with your Google account
instructions.step3: Click on "Get API Key" in the left sidebar
instructions.step4: Click "Create API key" and copy it
instructions.note: Important: Save your API key immediately - you won't be able to see it again.
